mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE.*, NOTICE_CATEGORY.name AS noticeCtName FROM NOTICE JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY ON NOTICE.noticeCtId = NOTICE_CATEGORY.id

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NOTICE.*, NOTICE_CATEGORY.name AS noticeCtName, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY ID DESC) AS rnum FROM NOTICE JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY ON NOTICE.noticeCtId = NOTICE_CATEGORY.id) A WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
SELECT NOTICE.*, NOTICE_CATEGORY.name AS noticeCtName FROM NOTICE JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY ON NOTICE.noticeCtId = NOTICE_CATEGORY.id WHERE noticeCtId = ${noticeCtId}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT NOTICE.*, NOTICE_CATEGORY.name AS noticeCtName, ROW_NUMBER() over (ORDER BY ID DESC) AS rnum FROM NOTICE JOIN NOTICE_CATEGORY ON NOTICE.noticeCtId = NOTICE_CATEGORY.id WHERE noticeCtId = ${noticeCtId}) A WHERE rnum BETWEEN ${start} AND ${end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(id, noticeCtId, title, content) VALUES (NOTICE_ID_SEQ.nextval, ${noticeCtId}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET noticeCtId = ${noticeCtId}, title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE id = ${id}
